name: mongodb-crud
description: List of User routes: ==== **BOLD** | **HTTP** | **Header(s)**  | **Body** | **Description** :---: | :---: | :---: | :---: | :---: `/book` | GET | token | none | Get all the Book `/book/:isbn` | GET | token | none | Get a single Book `/book/` | POST | token | none | Create a book `/book/:isbn` | PUT | token | none | Update a book with a new info `/book/:isbn` | DELETE | token | none | Delete a book
